summoned with #1167 Call Cyclops Tribe (Conjuration 3)

The Cyclops is a one-eyed giant sprung from the roots of a great mountain. The body of the Cyclops is huge and as hard as the rock from which it was born. The Cyclops is a master of Earth magic.
